name: Whack-A-Mon!
description:
The Monster Mash Jam

Hosted by Ian Lomas

(BUILT FOR MULTIPLE PLATFORMS - WebGL, Windows, Mac, Android)😀

Best played in Full-screen!

Welcome to this arcade mini-game featuring a whack-a-mole 🐻🔨style environment with monsters 🦇👻🐀🦈🐍🧟‍♂️! Whack a human and it's game over. Beat all 3 levels and collect 💯 teeth 🦷🦷🦷 to give to the tooth fairy 🧚‍♂️ to beat the game! Enjoy spooky 😱 sound effects, a real-time fog particle system, and addictive gameplay. You will rage quit ⚠️, but don't be too hard on yourself!! I eased up the difficulty a bit. Even I couldn't beat Level 3! 🤣

NOTE: If you go full-screen in WebGL and the screen is black, just click the screen and the game will appear!

Best of luck

-BurterButterBeans Studio 🎮
